about_the_game:
FREE-FOR-ALL & TEAMPLAY

Up to 4 players can enjoy this Demo in Free-for-All or a 2v2 Battle via Couch Play. Battle against Ai enemies, or recruit your roommates and indulge in the primal fun of beating each other up as giant monsters.

UNLEASH THE BEAST

Choose from 3 out of the original 10 GigaBash characters, each with their own unique moveset and playstyle to master. This Demo features Gorogong, Woolley, and Thundatross.

EASY TO LEARN, TRICKY TO MASTER

Taste the full brunt of the game’s combat system in this Demo. Learn to time your attacks, block your enemies, grab them by the horns and build your Giga Energy meter to transform into a terrifying S-Class Titan.

STOMPING GROUND

From bustling cityscapes to exotic locales. Have a taste of 4 unique Maps, each with its own unique map mechanic and design. This Demo features Kimura District, Tarabak Ruins, Slavagrad, and Luana Island.
detailed_description:
FREE-FOR-ALL & TEAMPLAY

Up to 4 players can enjoy this Demo in Free-for-All or a 2v2 Battle via Couch Play. Battle against Ai enemies, or recruit your roommates and indulge in the primal fun of beating each other up as giant monsters.

UNLEASH THE BEAST

Choose from 3 out of the original 10 GigaBash characters, each with their own unique moveset and playstyle to master. This Demo features Gorogong, Woolley, and Thundatross.

EASY TO LEARN, TRICKY TO MASTER

Taste the full brunt of the game’s combat system in this Demo. Learn to time your attacks, block your enemies, grab them by the horns and build your Giga Energy meter to transform into a terrifying S-Class Titan.

STOMPING GROUND

From bustling cityscapes to exotic locales. Have a taste of 4 unique Maps, each with its own unique map mechanic and design. This Demo features Kimura District, Tarabak Ruins, Slavagrad, and Luana Island.

name: GigaBash Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 480, GTX 570, GTX 670, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: This game supports XInput- and DirectInput-compatible USB controllers (inc. arcade sticks), such as Xbox 360 controller, Xbox One controller, Steam Controller and the DUALSHOCK wireless controller. It also supports keyboard but not mouse.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K @3.50GHz or AMD FX-9370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960, AMD Radeon R7 370, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: This game supports XInput- and DirectInput-compatible USB controllers (inc. arcade sticks), such as Xbox 360 controller, Xbox One controller, Steam Controller and the DUALSHOCK wireless controller. It also supports keyboard but not mouse.

short_description: Claim your place as king among Titans! GigaBash is a multiplayer arena brawler with gigantic film-inspired kaiju, larger than life heroes, earth-shattering special attacks and fully destructible environments.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
